cause.description:
Dystonia is a neurological disorder causing involuntary, sustained muscle contractions that result in repetitive movements, twisting and abnormal postures. An estimated 300,000 people in North America have dystonia.
1. Dystonia must be eliminated.
cause.mission: To advance research for more treatments, to promote awareness and education, to support the needs and well-being of affected individuals and families, and to ultimately find a cure.
cause.name: Stop Dystonia
